name: wordoftheweek
0:
”Alexa, open Word of the Week”
”Alexa, ask Word of the Week what is the word of the week”
”Alexa, ask word of the Week how to submit a word”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word of the week
des:
A weekly word to provide inspiration, motivation and empowerment.

Words are submitted by Alexa User's. To submit a word of the week please email squatchsoftware@outlook.com. 
Be sure to include the word and a description as to what makes it the word of the week. You may also optionally include a dedication.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
